#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:51:58

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max += x_min - x
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min -= x - x_max
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

N, X = list(map(int, input().split()))
L = list(map(int, input().split()))
L.sort()
print(L[0])

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:50:34

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:51:59

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x - x_min)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min = x_min + (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: gunjianpan
# @Date:   2020-09-13 18:50:17
# @Last Modified by:   gunjianpan
# @Last Modified time: 2020-09-13 18:51:15

# https://atcoder.jp/contests/abc178/tasks/abc178_c

import sys
read = sys.stdin.readline

N, X = list(map(int, input().split()))
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x.sort()

dist = []
for i in range(N):
    dist.append(abs(X - x[i]))
dist.sort()

ans = 0
for i in range(1, N):
    ans = max(ans, (dist[i] - dist[i - 1]) // 2)

print(ans)


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:52:23

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min, x_max = xs[0], xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

N, X = list(map(int, input().split()))
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x.sort()

dist = []
for i in range(N):
    dist.append(abs(X - x[i]))
dist.sort()

ans = 0
for i in range(1, N):
    ans = max(ans, (dist[i] - dist[i - 1]) // 2)

print(ans)


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:51:02

import sys

def solve(n, x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(n, x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
